name: The Gouda Age
description:
You are cheese!  The Golden Age of Space. Defend your home planet that is cheese.  The evil is mice.  Dodge their attacks and shoot them down!

Arrow keys or WASD to move.  Left Ctrl or left mouse click to shoot.  P to pause.  Be carefuly clicking the 'Quit' button, this will likely make the game not playable unless you refresh the screen!  Sorry <3

Made during the VTGP Fall 2019 Game Jam!
